com.jdbc.main.manager

Class JdbcTableManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jdbc.main.manager.JdbcTableManager

  • public class JdbcTableManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is table manager class where it handles what tables to use in the manager() method. Then it has crudandSearchMenuForTable() method where it has the menu for the CRUD and search operation.

    Created on Okt 23, 2017

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Saikat Talukder

    • Constructor Detail

      • JdbcTableManager

        public JdbcTableManager()
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • JdbcTableManager

        public JdbcTableManager(int userTableChoice,
                        java.util.Scanner scan)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Constructor and initialize userTableChoice as Integer and scan as Scanner.
        Parameters:
        userTableChoice - userTableChoice to set as Integer. userTableChoice holds value for the table to use.
        scan - scan to set as Scanner.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • Method Detail

      • crudandSearchMenuForTable

        public void crudandSearchMenuForTable()
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is a menu for all CRUD and search operation where user choice what to do. It has while loop with a Boolean variable called running which is true as long as user choice not to exit the table. If user choice exit table then running becomes false which breaks the while loop.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - that provides information on a database access error or other errors.
